sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GIS_ASSETS_CD ( ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, ASSETS_NM, ASSETS_SE_CD, MNG_DEPT_CD, OPER_DEPT_CD, LOCPLC, LNM, LNM_SUB, PRT_AT_CODE, PRPRTY_CD, LOC_CD, QUAY_CD, AR, USE_YN, INVSTMNT_MTHD, DRW_CREAT_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, ACQAMT, STNDRD, BLDDATE, BLD_DT, RM, GISCD ) VALUES ( #assetsCd#, #gisAssetsSubCd#, #gisAssetsCd#, #assetsNm#, #assetsSeCd#, #mngDeptCd#, #operDeptCd#, #locplc#, #lnm#, #lnmSub#, #prtAtCode#, #prprtyCd#, #locCd#, #quayCd#, #ar#, #useYn#, #invstmntMthd#, #drwCreatYear#, #drwLstSeq#, #acqamt#, #stndrd#, #blddate#, #bldDt#, #rm#, #giscd# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GIS_ASSETS_CD SET ID=#id# , NAME=#name# , DESCRIPTION=#description# , USE_YN=#useYn# WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=#prtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=#prtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, ASSETS_NM, ASSETS_SE_CD, MNG_DEPT_CD, OPER_DEPT_CD, LOCPLC, LNM, LNM_SUB, PRT_AT_CODE, PRPRTY_CD, LOC_CD, QUAY_CD, AR, USE_YN, INVSTMNT_MTHD, DRW_CREAT_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, ACQAMT, STNDRD, BLDDATE, BLD_DT, RM, GISCD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=#prtAtCode# AND GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GIS_ASSETS_CD, ASSETS_NM, ASSETS_SE_CD, MNG_DEPT_CD, OPER_DEPT_CD, LOCPLC, LNM, LNM_SUB, PRT_AT_CODE, PRPRTY_CD, LOC_CD, QUAY_CD, AR, USE_YN, INVSTMNT_MTHD, DRW_CREAT_YEAR, DRW_LST_SEQ, ACQAMT, STNDRD, BLDDATE, BLD_DT, RM, GISCD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD WHERE 1=1
PRT_AT_CODE=#prtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
ORDER BY PRT_AT_CODE, GIS_ASSETS_CD, GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD WHERE 1=1
PRT_AT_CODE=#prtAtCode#
GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd#
GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd#
